body_html:
I notice that a very similar code change to @kevin-keraudren's suggestion was actually later committed by @nealwu in tensorflow/models#934

But the documentation change to force new instance creation in MultiRNNCell in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/tutorials/recurrent.md hasn't been made. Should it be?
body_text:
I notice that a very similar code change to @kevin-keraudren's suggestion was actually later committed by @nealwu in tensorflow/models#934
But the documentation change to force new instance creation in MultiRNNCell in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/tutorials/recurrent.md hasn't been made. Should it be?
body:
I notice that a very similar code change to @kevin-keraudren's suggestion was actually later committed by @nealwu in https://github.com/tensorflow/models/pull/934

But the documentation change to force new instance creation in MultiRNNCell in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/tutorials/recurrent.md hasn't been made. Should it be?
